conbody.p: Most of Yesod is about serving content over HTTP. But that's only half the story: someone has to receive it. And even when you're writing a web app, sometimes that someone will be you. If you want to consume content from other services or interact with RESTful APIs, you'll need to write client code. And the recommended approach for that is http-conduit.
This chapter is not directly connected to Yesod, and will be generally useful for anyone wanting to make HTTP requests.
